si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් විකුණුම් මිල රු.

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar sales price was Rs.

summary_lines: I'm unable to provide real-time data or updates such as today's currency exchange rates directly. However, I can help summarize information or answer questions based on historical data or general knowledge. If you have specific details about the currency exchange rate between the US dollar and another currency, please share them, and I'll do my best to provide a summary within the character limit.
